topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55241d6b6368727fc1080500#post_55241d6b6368727fc1080500
OH SHIT I FORGOT THE FRIENDSCAST WAS TODAY!

Also its kiiind of hard to explain but its basically a Gundam show for kids.

Like no deaths, blood, and politics. 

The Gundam's in this show are just plastic toy models that can be used in battles, tournaments, and stuff like that.

You should start from the first series if you want to get into it. Its surprisingly really good.
